import React from 'react'; import s from './Users.module.css'; const Users = (props) => { if(prop) props.setUsers([ { id: 1, photoUrl: 'https://www.pngitem.com/pimgs/m/4-42408_vector-art-design-men-fashion-vector-art-illustration.png', fullName: 'Alex', followed: false, status: 'hello', location: { city: 'Samara', country: 'Russia' } }, { id: 2, photoUrl: 'https://www.pngitem.com/pimgs/m/4-42408_vector-art-design-men-fashion-vector-art-illustration.png', fullName: 'Matvey', followed: false, status: 'hello', location: { city: 'Samara', country: 'Russia' } }, { id: 3, photoUrl: 'https://www.pngitem.com/pimgs/m/4-42408_vector-art-design-men-fashion-vector-art-illustration.png', fullName: 'Artem', followed: false, status: 'hello', location: { city: 'Samara', country: 'Russia' } }, { id: 4, fullName: 'Egor', photoUrl: 'https://www.pngitem.com/pimgs/m/4-42408_vector-art-design-men-fashion-vector-art-illustration.png', followed: false, status: 'hello', location: { city: 'Samara', country: 'Russia' } }, ]) return
{ props.users.map(u =>
{u.followed ? : }
{u.fullName}
{u.status}
{u.location.country}
{u.location.city}
) }
} export default Users;
